author: wtopstaff
title: Bruins-Avalanche Sums
text:
1 1—2 
First Period_1, Boston, K.Miller 1 (Chara, Connolly), 5:49. 2, Boston, Hayes 1 (Chara, C.Miller), 8:11. Penalties_Chara, Bos (hooking), :31. 
Second Period_3, Boston, Randell 1 (McQuaid), 3:46. 4, Boston, Kelly 1 (Spooner, Hayes), 9:30. 5, Boston, Spooner 1 (Hayes), 15:32. 6, Colorado, Landeskog 4, 18:31 (pp). Penalties_Pastrnak, Bos, double minor (high-sticking), 18:10. 
Third Period_7, Colorado, Mitchell 3 (Zadorov, Barrie), 11:20. 8, Boston, Krejci 3 (Hayes), 18:31 (en). Penalties_Pastrnak, Bos (hooking), 4:02; Comeau, Col (hooking), 7:08; Barrie, Col (tripping), 13:39. 
Shots on Goal_Boston 9-11-5_25. Colorado 5-6-11_22. 
Power-play opportunities_Boston 0 of 2; Colorado 1 of 4. 
Goalies_Boston, Gustavsson 1-0-0 (22 shots-20 saves). Colorado, Varlamov 1-2-0 (19-14), Berra (15:32 second, 5-5). 
A_15,082 (18,007). T_2:17. 
Referees_Mike Leggo, Rob Martell. Linesmen_Kiel Murchison, John Grandt. Topics:
